Text: RE Im Leaving EnronMary Thanks for the good note and congratulations to you as you take this next step in your career It has to be sure been a pleasure working with you I trust you will remember that the Council has an number if you need to be in touch with the great Northwest And if I have questions about how theyre doing things in other parts of the country I hope you wont mind fielding an inquiry to two Again everything good in the new position Bill Original Message From mailto Sent Friday March AM To KADDENCOM kaddencom WPPCorg Devon Kehoe TomO PAgov ernercom judy WPPORG MCIMAILCOM Subject Im Leaving Enron I am going to be the Senior Regulatory Counsel at ISO New England starting on April My last day in the Portland area will be March I enjoyed working with you and wish you the best of everything My new address will be Mary Hain Senior Regulatory Counsel ISO New England Inc One Sullivan Road Holyoke MA SONEcom
